plot outline: 'Maalgudi Days is an emotional suspense thriller with prominence to children. The movie is directed by three debutant brothers Vivek, Visakh, and Vinod. Story is taken through the eyes of two school children- Milan and Atheena, who study at Malgudi Public School. One day, they meet a stranger Zephan (Anoop Menon) in the forest. This rendezvous change the course of their life. Who is this mysterious stranger, why is he in forest and what outcome does he bring, forms the plot.
title: Maalgudi Days
plot: The movie is set in the backdrop of an imaginary school named Malgudi Residential School. The movie revolves around a mysterious man Zephan Solomon(Anoop Menon) and two students of this school.

'_Maalgudi Days_ (qv) is an emotional suspense thriller with prominence to children. The movie is directed by three debutant brothers Vivek, Visakh, and Vinod. Story is taken through the eyes of two school children- Milan and Atheena, who study at Malgudi Public School. One day, they meet a stranger Zephan (Anoop Menon) in the forest. This rendezvous change the course of their life. Who is this mysterious stranger, why is he in forest and what outcome does he bring, forms the plot.::vcompany
